title: Charming home in Rosemary Garden Area of San Jose! COMING SOON!!
posting_body: Charming Single-Family home in the Rosemary Garden District of San Jose.
This Home is near Rosemary Garden Park as well as Japantown, and San Jose municipal golf course.

This property also has easy access to Highways 87, 101, and 880 and is a quick drive (or light Rail Ride) to Santa Clara University, San Jose Market Center mall, Earthquake’s Soccer stadium, SAP Center, and Downtown San Jose.
Important aspects of this wonderful property:
-	Spacious 1621 SQ Ft. single store home
-       Newer Kitchen with Granite Countertops and Stainless Steel Appliances
-	Separate cottage for office, separate work space or storage.
-	Cats and/or Dogs (under 50 pounds) will be considered with additional security deposit
We prefer long term tenants looking to sign a lease of at least a minimum of 12 to 24 months.
Its preferable to have no pets but cats and small dogs under 50 pounds will be considered with an additional security deposit.
Property will be ready to move in between August 10th, 2022 and August 15th, 2022
If interested, Please contact me thru craigslist and your name and info will be placed on a list and will be contacted in from that list to schedule showings when property is ready!
